name: Generate jsDelivr Links

on:
  push:
    paths:
      - '*.mp3'
      - '**/*.mp3'

jobs:
  generate-links:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Generate jsDelivr links
        run: |
          echo "jsDelivr links generated on $(date)" > links.txt
          echo "" >> links.txt
          for file in $(find . -name '*.mp3'); do
            cleanpath=$(echo $file | sed 's|^\./||')
            echo "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/thdgml2339-maker/music-files/${cleanpath}" >> links.txt
          done

      - name: Commit and push links.txt
        run: |
          git config --global user.name "github-actions[bot]"
          git config --global user.email "github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"
          git add links.txt
          git commit -m "Update jsDelivr links [auto]"
          git push
